price: Muhuri wake ni miski. Na katika hayo washindanie wenye kushindana.
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
footnotes: Kuhifadhiwa huko hakukuzidisha ila uzuri wake. Na kupata neema hizo, basi, na washindanie wanao shindana.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
